appSettings_verboseLedgerMode_subtitle: When signing with your Ledger hardware wallet, should all instructions be displayed?
appSettings_iCloudSyncEnabledAlert_messa: iCloud sync is now enabled, but it might take up to an hour before your wallet data is uploaded to iCloud.
appSettings_confirmCloudSyncDisableAlert: Disabling iCloud sync will delete the iCloud backup data, are you sure you want to disable iCloud sync?
appSettings_resetWallet_subtitle: Clear all data in this Wallet
appSettings_resetWalletDialog_message: WARNING. This will clear all contents of your Wallet. If you have no backup, you will lose access to your Accounts and Personas permanently.
appSettings_entityHiding_info: Accounts and Personas you have created can be hidden in your Radix Wallet, acting as if “deleted”.
appSettings_entityHiding_unhideAllConfir: Are you sure you wish to unhide all Accounts and Personas? This cannot be undone.
